title: We're allowed to kill each other
body:
But we're not allowed to antagonize each other...

So we're battling to take other peoples fun away but we're not allowed to take the fun out of it?

http://i2.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/531/557/a88.jpg

replies.body:
So the only way to have fun in this game is to never die?

I think you've got the wrong genre. Maybe you can try out Sudoku or Scrabble instead
Yes that is 100% not a distortion of what I said.

The fact that you find dying unfun is still a bad sign for someone into MoBAs, they literally make up a third of the ally-to-enemy interactions in the game, evenly split between dying, killing and trading, excluding a few occasional champion specific interactions.

If there weren't any antagonizing, dying wouldn't be bad.
